t4me module¶

This module, t4me.py contains the main driver for the program. Most standard calls are included, but if the users wants, custom execution can be adapted in this file.

It is with this file T4ME is executed with the command

python t4me.py
t4me.main()¶

Main routine.

Sets up the calculations and calls necessary sub-routines.

Notes

This routine can be modified for more advanced usage. For day-day operations, the most used configurations are available by setting the parameters in the general configuration file ( defaults to param.yml).
